song.eTitle: OUR ATONING JUDGE -- Romans 14 and 1 John 2, NIV

verses.verse: Why do you judge your brother? Or why do you look down on your brother? For we will all stand before God's judgment seat.
It is written: "'As surely as I live,' says the Lord, 'Every knee will bow before me; every tongue will confess to God.'"
So then, each of us will give an account of himself to God.
My dear children, I write this to you so that you will not sin. But if anybody does sin, we have one who speaks to the Father in our defenseâ€”Jesus Christ, the Righteous One.
He is the atoning sacrifice for our sins, and not only for ours but also for the sins of the whole world.
